name: AriGato (mylee2662)
description:
Originally a final project for a computer science course, AriGato is a Tapper spinoff where you must serve conveyor belt sushi to your feline customers. Prepare and send sushi down conveyor belts to awaiting customers while collecting empty plates that they send back.

Controls:

Use the up and down buttons to navigate between conveyor belts. Prepare sushi by pressing the space bar.
